question: Which of the following is the correct chronological order for states with highest percentage of Net Irrigated Area to Net Sown Area?
option1: Uttar Pradesh> Punjab> Haryana> Tamil Nadu
option2: Punjab > Haryana> Uttar Pradesh> Tamil Nadu
option3: Punjab> Uttar Pradesh> Tamil Nadu> Haryana
option4: Tamil Nadu> Punjab> Haryana> Uttar Pradesh
answer: Uttar Pradesh> Punjab> Haryana> Tamil Nadu
explanation:
First option is the correct answer
Uttar Pradesh> Punjab> Haryana> Tamil Nadu
